com.pos.device.led

Class Led

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.led.Led

  • public class Led
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is definition of LED operator.

    Created by mengwenti on 2016/11/18.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LED_FLASH
      The status of LED flash, you can specific the interval time (ms) of flash.
      static java.lang.String LED_IC_CARD
      The hardware IC card reader LED(if it is exist) name.

      The hardware keyboard LED(if it is exist) name.

      The hardware magnetic card reader LED(if it is exist) name.

      The blue LED name.

      The green LED name.
      static java.lang.String LED_NFC_3
      The yellow LED name.
      static java.lang.String LED_NFC_4
      The red LED name.
      static int LED_OFF
      The status of LED off.
      static int LED_ON
      The status of LED on.
